page.title: 14CHURCH AND RELIGION
page.content: {CHURCH AND RELIGION Religion used to have a much bigger part in people's every day life in small Scottish communities like ours. Nowadays,although we still go to { {Church }sometimes ,it doesn't seem so inportant now.We all go to {Church }at Christmas,Easter and times like that and most of the children in the Parish go to Sunday school. In the past people used to be afraid of the minister but our local minister is nice and everybody likes him.He goes to three {Churches} and two schools.The {Churches}are Stenton,Whittingehame and EastLinton. He goes to East Linton every week but takes it week about with Stenton and Whittingehame.He wouldn't move to another Parish because he likes this one.He thinks the people are friendly. Not nosey,just interested.
